topic.title: 4.11.2 ATC Actuator Jog and Single Mode

header.para: ATC Actuator Jog and Single Mode

body.para: For ATC actuators there are two operation modes available, Jog and Single.
In Jog mode, the selected actuator will turn on while the [ON] button is pressed. Once the button is released, the actuator will be off. The [OFF] button will turn off the selected actuator.
In Single mode, the selected actuator will maintain the status accordingly to the [ON] / [OFF] button pressed even when the button is released.

image.src: ATC Actuator Jog or Single Mode.JPG

para.draft-comment: Replace the Figure to " ATC Actuator Jog or Single Mode" from Chp 4.11 folder in Graphic folder.
